name: Goliath
description: Goliaths are towering, powerful people descended from giants, driven by competition and a desire to prove themselves.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws to end the Grappled condition. You count as one size larger for carrying capacity.

features.name: Giant Ancestry
features.description: Choose one: Cloud's Jaunt (teleport 30 ft as Bonus Action), Fire's Burn (+1d10 fire on hit), Frost's Chill (+1d6 cold on hit, -10 ft speed), Hill's Tumble (knock Large or smaller Prone on hit), Stone's Endurance (Reaction: reduce damage by 1d12 + CON mod), Storm's Thunder (Reaction: 1d8 thunder to attacker within 60 ft). Uses: Proficiency Bonus per Long Rest.

features.name: Large Form
features.description: Starting at 5th level, as a Bonus Action you become Large for 10 minutes (if space permits). You have advantage on Strength checks and your Speed increases by 10 feet. Once per Long Rest.
